name: App La Carte – Apps made to order
author: App La Carte Ltd

sections.description:
Create a completely native mobile phone app with App La Carte by simply installing a plugin, absolutely no coding necessary! Once installed visit App La Carte set up your app, enter your website URL and you’re done.

Setting up

Install the App La Carte plugin, set up your app by visiting App La Carte. Select WordPress as a feature, choose your theme colors and fonts, add in your website URL in the WordPress tab and you’re done. To view your app on a mobile phone download the App La Carte app available on iTunes or the Google Play store and enter your login details.

Features

This plugin creates a full featured native app for your iPhone and Android! With a fantastic interface and a whole lot of features built right in including Search, viewing and posting comments, viewing image galleries. You can be confident your website readership will shoot through the roof.

Push notification

Want to inform your readers about your latest article? You can do just that be sending them Push notifications. Reach both iPhone and Android users in a jiffy. You’ll never find a more powerful way to reach your readers.

App La Carte

With App La Carte’s solid list of features that grow by the day. You don’t need to settle with just WordPress in your app even though that’s good enough, you can even add on a whole lot of other functionality that’s available on App La Carte to your app.

Powerful and Simple

Add and arrange features on your app by simply dragging and dropping them, change the theme, icons and your your app is instantly updated in real time on both iPhone and Android!

App Analytics

The app also seamlessly integrates with Google analytics, simply add a publisher ID into the CMS and your app usage is completely tracked by industrial strength Google analytics!

More Information

Please visit our website at applacarte.com for more information,
Follow us on Twitter
Like us on Facebook
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘applacarte_wp’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to App La Carte page under Settings section.
  4. Check the categories you want to display on the mobile app.
  5. Visit www.applacarte.com to create and customize your app.
sections.faq:
After the installation it is not working

Have you make the plugin is active? You must make the plugin to be active. Please see screen shots

Where can I get help?

Please visit our website contact form, we get back to you ASAP.

screenshots.caption: Find the App La Carte plugin under Settings.
Select the categories you want to show up on your app. Add in the number of posts and comments you want to show up in the app
Latest articles is the first screen users see when they open your app.
Setting up the app by selecting the Wordpress feature and dragging it to a desired position.
Adding the website URL to the app to enable the app to go live.
